name: Brackeys Ville
description:
Hey guys.

Thank you for coming here and thank you so much if you played or will play our game.

Unfortunately it wasn't completed in time, but we still believe you'll be able to understand our game.

Game Designer - Cedrik Rocha   @cedrikrocha
Story - Marcelo Pessini
Sound Designer - Rodrigo Passos @stepsaudio
Programmer - Jonathan
Programmer  - Arthur Graciano
